ext_weather.name: Overnight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Areas of fog and a chance of rain showers before 2am, then areas of fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2am and 4am, then patchy fog and a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms between 4am and 5am, then patchy fog and a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 59. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
